Package org.qcri.rheem.core.plan.executionplan

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChannelInitializer
    Sets up the usage of Channel in an ExecutionPlan for a given Platform.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Channel
    Models the data movement between to ExecutionTasks.
    ExecutionPlan
    Represents an executable, cross-platform data flow.
    ExecutionStage
    Resides within a PlatformExecution and represents the minimum execution unit that is controlled by Rheem.
    ExecutionStageLoop
    This class models the execution equivalent of LoopSubplans.
    ExecutionTask
    Serves as an adapter to include ExecutionOperators, which are usually parts of RheemPlans, in ExecutionPlans.
    PlatformExecution
    Complete data flow on a single platform, that consists of multiple ExecutionStages.
